A Timely Caution.--We as a people have fallen into the opposite error. We acknowledge the claims of 
                                                                           599
God's law, and teach the people the duty of rendering obedience. We believe in giving everything, but we do not see that we must take as well as give. We fail to have that trust, that faith, which keeps the soul abiding in Christ. We claim little, when we might claim much; for there is no limit to the promises of God.
